lemma: TTherefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come
context: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come. Those who live in spiritual light have a renewed character. Now, when we sin, we cannot rest. We cannot just forget our sin, but immediately we repent and turn from that sin and receive the Lord's forgiveness.
